tool_description: Analyzes fault current levels and protection system coordination by calculating short-circuit currents and evaluating protective device settings.

fault_location.description: Bus or node identifier where fault is analyzed

fault_type.description: Type of fault: three-phase, line-to-ground, line-to-line, double-line-to-ground

system_impedance.description: System impedance matrix values in per unit

voltage_level.description: System voltage level at fault location in kV (0.4 to 800)

error_messages: Invalid fault location: Fault location not found in system model.
Unsupported fault type: Use one of [three-phase, line-to-ground, line-to-line, double-line-to-ground].
Invalid impedance data: System impedance values must be positive numbers.
Voltage level out of range: Must be between 0.4 and 800 kV.
X/R ratio out of range: Must be between 1 and 50.
Protection device format error: Each device entry must contain 4 comma-separated values.
usage: Specify fault_location, fault_type, system_impedance array, and voltage_level. Optionally include protection_devices data and x_r_ratio for comprehensive fault analysis.

fault_current_magnitude.description: RMS fault current magnitude in amperes

fault_current_angle.description: Fault current phase angle in degrees

coordination_status.description: Protection coordination status: coordinated, marginal, miscoordinated

critical_clearing_time.description: Critical fault clearing time in milliseconds
